Body: I'm in the process of testing Virtual Fire Alarm. I completed up to the step 'Try out the virtual fire alarm -> Action -> View device details' in the link 'https://docs.wso2.com/display/IOTS330/Enterprise+IoT+solution#7e9295d0766f43019567911516cbf83e'. But
column9: the real-time data was not displayed so that
column10:
temperature readings under device statistics in the graph at the server page is empty.

There were exceptions and error messages displayed on analytics.bat
column11: broker.bat and virtual fire alarm start-device.bat. Also
column13:
the connection status is displayed as 'Not-Registered'. I did log-in to the DAS (Data Analytics Server) and just added some permissions for my account. I'm not aware what should be done at DAS clearly.

So
column14: are there some settings/registration to be done at DAS? Or is this a bug in WSO2 IoT server? If so
column15:
how to resolve it? Please give me some insight on this. I have attached the relevant screenshots below. Thank you.

Exception at analytics.bat

Error message at broker.bat

Error message at Virtual Fire Alarm start-device.bat
